#summary SSA4J Annotation Reference

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= @!ScrapeSession =
This is the top level annotation for any Class that will bind to a scrape session.

|| Attribute || Description ||
|| name || The name of the scrape session. ||
|| errors || An array of [#@ScrapeSessionError @ScrapeSessionError] ||

== Example Basic Usage ==
{{{
@ScrapeSession(name="Shopping Site")
public class ShoppingSiteScrapeSession {
    ...
}
}}}

= @!ScrapeSessionErrors =

|| Attribute || Description ||
|| value || An array of [#@ScrapeSessionError @ScrapeSessionError] ||

== @!ScrapeSessionError ==
|| Attribute || Description ||
|| code || An error code, can be anything ||
|| name || Session Variable name that, if present, signals the presence of an error ||


== Example Basic Usage ==
{{{
@ScrapeSession(name="Shopping Site")
@ScrapeSessionErrors({
    @ScrapeSessionError(code=100,name="INVALID_LOGIN"),
    @ScrapeSessionError(code=200,name="SESSION_EXPIRED")
})
public class ShoppingSiteScrapeSession {
    ...
}
}}}
